Title: China eyes US farm exports for retaliation, as importers rush to ...
Description: Chinese manufacturers reported an uptick in orders in February as importers rushed to beat higher U.S. tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump, as a Chinese state media report said that Beijing was considering ways to retaliate.

Title: UN rights chief alarms by 'fundamental shift' in US direction
Description: The UN rights chief voiced deep concern Monday over the United States' 'fundamental shift' in direction since Donald Trump returned to power, and decried the 'unchecked power' of 'unelected tech oligarchs.'

Title: Berlin urges Israel to 'immediately' stop blocking aid to Gaza
Description: Germany on Monday urged Israel to 'immediately' stop blocking aid flowing into war-ravaged Gaza, after Israel made the move as talks on a truce extension appeared to hit an impasse.

Title: One dead in Israel stabbing attack, assailant killed
Description: A stabbing attack at a transport station in the Israeli city of Haifa left one person dead and several wounded on Monday, medics said, in what police called a 'terror attack' whose perpetrator was killed.

Title: China eyes US farm exports for retaliation, report says, as impor...
Description: Chinese manufacturers reported an uptick in orders in February as importers rushed to beat higher U.S. tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump, as a Chinese state media report said that Beijing was considering ways to retaliate.

Title: Sex worker drama 'Anora' sweeps Oscars with 5 awards including be...
Description: Anora,' the story of a New York sex worker who gets a chance at a new life when she marries a wealthy Russian client on a whim, won five Academy Awards on Sunday, including the coveted best picture Oscar.

Title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy says he can salvage relationship with US
Description: Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskyy said on Sunday he believed he could salvage his relationship with U.S. President Donald Trump after their explosive meeting in the Oval Office, but that talks needed to continue behind closed doors.

Title: Private lunar lander Blue Ghost aces moon touchdown with special ...
Description: A private lunar lander carrying a drill, vacuum and other experiments for NASA touched down on the moon Sunday, the latest in a string of companies looking to kickstart business on Earth's celestial neighbor ahead of astronaut missions .

Title: Trump names cryptocurrencies in strategic reserve, sending prices...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump on social media announced the names of five digital assets he expects to include in a new U.S. strategic reserve of cryptocurrencies on Sunday, spiking the market value of each.

Title: UK, France and Ukraine agree to work on ceasefire plan for Russia...
Description: Britain, France and Ukraine have agreed to work on a ceasefire plan to present to the United States, British Prime Minister Keir Starmer said Sunday as he prepared to host a summit of European leaders to discuss ending the war.

Title: Pope gets visit from Vatican secretary of state, says he's sharin...
Description: A stable Pope Francis had a visit Sunday from the Vatican secretary of state as he continued his recovery from double pneumonia, but again skipped his weekly noon blessing to avoid even a brief public appearance from the hospital.

Title: China's PMI data returns to positive territory for February
Description: China's purchasing managers' index, a key indicator for manufacturing activity, reached a three-month high in February and returned to positive territory as the country ramped up measures to boost its economy.

Title: White House row with Ukraine raises stakes for European summit in...
Description: It was supposed to cap a week of whirlwind diplomacy advancing the prospect of peace in Ukraine.

Title: Musk's DOGE fires federal tech team that built free tax-filing si...
Description: The Trump administration has pulled the plug on a team of tech-savvy civil servants that helped to build the Internal Revenue Serviceâ€™s free tax-filing service and revamp websites across government, a spokesperson for the General Service Administration said on Saturday.

Title: N. Korea's Mount Paektu to be designated as UNESCO Global Geopark
Description: The North Korean side of Mount Paektu, an active stratovolcano on the North Korean-Chinese border, is expected to be designated as a UNESCO Global Geopark next month, sources said Sunday.

Title: Trump orders national security impact probe on lumber imports, co...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order Saturday to launch an investigation into the impact of lumber and timber imports on America's national security, a move that could lead to a new tariff imposition.

Title: Trump-Zelenskyy shouting match takes world leaders aback as Europ...
Description: European leaders threw their support behind Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy after his spat with Donald Trump sent shockwaves across the world, casting doubts over efforts to end the Russia-Ukraine war.

Title: China tells its AI leaders to avoid US travel over security conce...
Description: Chinese authorities are instructing the country's top artificial intelligence entrepreneurs and researchers to avoid travel to the United States, the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.

Title: Zelenskyy leaves White House without signing minerals deal after ...
Description: President Donald Trump berated Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy for being 'disrespectful' Friday in an extraordinary Oval Office meeting, then abruptly called off the signing of a minerals deal that Trump said would have moved Ukraine closer to ending its war with Russia.

Title: N. Korea warns of 'resolute' action against multilateral sanction...
Description: North Korea threatened Monday to take 'resolute' action after a South Korea-led monitoring group implementing U.N. sanctions against the North over its nuclear and missile programs has launched official activities.

Title: Far-right AfD wins eastern Germany by huge margin as divisions re...
Description: The far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) was the clear winner of Sunday's parliamentary election in the states that make up the former East Germany, highlighting lasting divisions almost a quarter of a century since the country was reunified.

Title: N. Korean worker's party delegation visits Moscow: KCNA
Description: A high-ranking delegation from North Korea's Workers' Party has arrived in Moscow for a visit at the invitation of Russia's ruling party, state media reported Tuesday.

Title: ByteDance restructures AI division, hiring new expert from Google...
Description: TikTok owner ByteDance is restructuring its artificial intelligence (AI) department after having poached an expert from Google to lead foundation research, according to employees of the Chinese tech giant.

Title: Deputy Pentagon chief nominee calls for efforts to stem growth of...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump's pick for deputy defense secretary highlighted the need Tuesday to stem the growth of North Korea's nuclear and missile arsenals, saying the recalcitrant regime poses a 'clear' threat to security on the Korean Peninsula and around the world.

Title: Netanyahu says Israel won't allow Syrian forces 'south of Damascu...
Description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says Israel will not allow Syriaâ€™s new army or the insurgent group that led the ouster of former President Bashar Assad to 'enter the area south of Damascus' as his government made clear Israeli forces would stay in parts of southern Syria for an indefinite period.

Title: N. Korea's Kim stresses 'actual experiences in modern warfare' du...
Description: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un has visited a military academy in Pyongyang, emphasizing the need to educate soldiers on 'the actual experiences of modern warfare' and master rapidly advanced weapons, state media reported Wednesday.

Title: Federal workers confront mass confusion as Musk's deadline to lis...
Description: Confusion and chaos loom as hundreds of thousands of federal employees begin their workweek on Monday facing a deadline from President Donald Trumpâ€™s cost-cutting chief, Elon Musk, to explain their recent accomplishments or risk losing their jobs.

Title: Vice FM highlights Russia-NK military ties exacerbating N. Korea'...
Description: A Korean vice foreign minister has emphasized that growing military cooperation between Russia and North Korea is further complicating the already dire human rights situation in the reclusive regime, the ministry said Wednesday.

Title: China's Alibaba to invest $50 bil. in AI, cloud computing
Description: Chinese tech giant Alibaba said Monday it will spend more than $50 billion on artificial intelligence and cloud computing over the next three years, a week after co-founder Jack Ma was seen meeting President Xi Jinping.

Title: N. Korea likely to ramp up military activities this year: unifica...
Description: South Korea's unification ministry said Wednesday that North Korea is likely to ramp up its military activities this year, citing the country's designation of 2025 as 'a year of training.'

Title: Masses of mourners attend the funeral of Hezbollah leader Nasrall...
Description: Hundreds of thousands of people packed into a stadium in Beirut and nearby streets on Sunday for the funeral of Hezbollah's former leader, Hassan Nasrallah , nearly five months after he was killed in an Israeli airstrike.

Title: Captured NK soldiers' intention 'most important factor' for their...
Description: South Korea's top diplomat said Wednesday that confirming the captured North Korean soldiers' intentions is the key factor before allowing them to defect to the South, reaffirming Seoul's willingness to bring them here.

Title: China's Xi affirms 'no limits' partnership with Putin in call on ...
Description: China's President Xi Jinping affirmed his 'no limits' partnership in a phone call with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Monday, China's state media reported, on the third anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

Title: US congressman proposes Korean Peninsula peace bill again
Description: A U.S. congressman said Wednesday that he has introduced a bill again to call for a formal end to the 1950-53 Korean War and a binding agreement for peace on the Korean Peninsula.

Title: EU suspends sanctions on key Syria economic sectors
Description: The European Union on Monday eased sanctions on Syria's energy, transport and banking sectors in a bid to help the country's reconstruction after the fall of Bashar al-Assad.

Title: Ruling parties of N. Korea, Russia agree to expand cooperation: K...
Description: A high-ranking official from North Korea's ruling Workers' Party has held talks with the secretary general of Russia's ruling United Russia party and signed a protocol to expand cooperation between their parties, the North's state media reported Thursday.

Title: Pedophile French surgeon goes on trial for abusing nearly 300
Description: A former French surgeon went on trial Monday charged with raping or sexually assaulting almost 300 patients, most of them children and some of them unconscious at the time, in one of the country's largest child sex abuse cases.

Title: FBI accuses N. Korean-backed hackers of stealing $1.5 bil. in cry...
Description: The FBI has accused North Korean-linked hackers of conducting one of the largest thefts of cryptocurrency publicly known, seizing some $1.5 billion worth of ethereum from a Dubai-based firm.

Title: UK announces sweeping package of sanctions against Russia
Description: Britain on Monday announced what it said was its largest package of sanctions against Russia since the early days of the war in Ukraine, including companies worldwide that supply components used by the Russian military.

Title: N. Korea launched strategic cruise missiles this week to prove nu...
Description: North Korea said Friday it launched strategic cruise missiles in waters off its west coast earlier this week, with its leader Kim Jong-un calling for thorough war preparedness with the country's nuclear forces and readiness for their use.

Title: Vatican: Pope Francis' 'night went well,' is resting; condition s...
Description: Pope Francis slept comfortably without additional complications but remained in critical condition with kidney and respiratory issues, the Vatican said Monday morning.

Title: Trump says Canada, Mexico tariffs moving 'forward' on schedule
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Monday that tariffs he unveiled on Canada and Mexico are moving forward as planned, addressing reporters after meeting with French counterpart Emmanuel Macron, who urged for 'fair competition' in trade.

Title: Trump, Macron display stark differences on Ukraine despite friend...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron displayed stark differences on Monday in their approach to Ukraine, exposing a divide between the United States and Europe over Trump's bid for a quick ceasefire deal with Russia.

Title: Ukraine rupture grows as US sides with Russia at UN
Description: The United States sided with Russia twice Monday at the United Nations, as they sought to avoid any condemnation of Moscow's invasion of its neighbor three years ago.

Title: Trump's US government shake-up hits agency enforcing export contr...
Description: The indiscriminate shake-up of the U.S. government under President Donald Trump has made headlines for affecting everything from nuclear weapons safety to programmes that fight diseases worldwide.

Title: Russia's Putin outlines potential aluminum, rare earth deals with...
Description: Russian President Vladimir Putin offered the U.S. the opportunity for joint exploration of the country's rare earth metals deposits, as well as the supply of aluminum to the U.S. domestic market, under a future economic deal.

Title: Pope Francis met at hospital with Vatican No. 2 over candidates f...
Description: Pope Francis, hospitalized in critical condition with double pneumonia, was well enough to meet with the Vatican secretary of state and his deputy to approve new decrees for saints and call a formal meeting to set the dates for their canonization, the Vatican said Tuesday.

Title: German family-run machine maker issues SOS to future government
Description: Facing a slowing German economy, high energy bills, onerous bureaucracy and the threat of US tariffs, a Black Forest-based factory equipment maker is issuing a plea for help to the country's next government.

Title: Trump orders investigation into possible tariffs on copper
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump signed an executive order Tuesday to investigate how copper imports threaten America's national security and economic stability, in a move that could lead to the imposition of new tariffs on the metal used to produce aircraft, vehicles, ships and other military hardware.

Title: Trump gov't will end EB-5 investor visa, replace with 'Gold Card'...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump's administration will abolish the EB-5 immigrant investor visa program and replace it with the 'Gold Card' for those who will be able to pay $5 million to the U.S. government, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said Tuesday.

Title: Alibaba previews new AI reasoning model to challenge DeepSeek R1,...
Description: Chinese e-commerce firm Alibaba Group Holding on Tuesday unveiled a preview of its next reasoning model QwQ-Max, which could rival industry-leading competitors including OpenAI's o1 and DeepSeek's R1, heating up the global artificial intelligence (AI) race.

Title: Russia's Lavrov aligns positions with Iran on nuclear program
Description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and Iran's top leaders aligned positions on issues around Iran's nuclear program at talks in Tehran on Tuesday, Russia's Foreign Ministry said.

Title: Tesla's market value tumbles below $1 tril. as its Europe sales s...
Description: Tesla's stock tumbled 8 percent on Tuesday, pushing its market value below $1 trillion for the first time since November after data showed the electric car maker's sales slumped in Europe in January.

Title: US, Ukraine agree to terms of critical minerals deal
Description: The U.S. and Ukraine have agreed on the terms of a draft minerals deal central to Kyiv's push to win Washington's support as President Donald Trump seeks to rapidly end the war with Russia, two sources with knowledge of the matter said on Tuesday.

Title: Israel, Hamas agree on new exchange, leaving fragile ceasefire in...
Description: Israeli and Hamas officials said Tuesday they have reached an agreement to exchange the bodies of dead hostages for the release of hundreds of Palestinian prisoners, keeping their fragile ceasefire intact for at least a few more days.

Title: China says Taiwan 'manipulating' undersea cable cutting before fa...
Description: China's government said on Wednesday that Taiwan was 'manipulating' possible Chinese involvement in the latest severing of an undersea communications cable, saying the island was casting aspersions before the facts were clear.

Title: Texas pipeline company's $300 mil. lawsuit against Greenpeace hea...
Description: A Texas pipeline company's lawsuit seeking potentially hundreds of millions of dollars from Greenpeace was set to advance with opening statements Wednesday in a trial the environmental organization calls an effort to silence critics of the oil industry.

Title: Rubio says US will not 'abandon' relations with Korea, Japan

Title: Senate confirms Jamieson Greer to be Trump's top trade negotiator...
Description: The Senate has confirmed Jamieson Greer, a veteran of President Donald Trump's first-term economic battles with China, Mexico and Canada, to be America's top trade negotiator.

Title: Trump sows confusion on tariffs for Canada, Mexico, floats 25% du...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday raised hopes for another month-long pause on steep new tariffs on imports from Mexico and Canada, saying they could take effect on April 2, and floated a 25 percent 'reciprocal' tariff on European cars and other goods.

Title: Hamas hands over bodies of 4 hostages, Israel frees Palestinian p...
Description: Hamas handed over the bodies of four Israeli hostages while it waited for hundreds of Palestinian prisoners to be released by Israel in return, in an overnight exchange marking the final swap as part of a fragile truce in Gaza.

Title: Trump declines to say whether US would defend Taiwan in attack by...

Description: Michelle Trachtenberg, a former child star who appeared in the 1996 'Harriet the Spy' hit movie and went on to co-star in two buzzy millennial-era TV shows - 'Buffy the Vampire Slayer' and 'Gossip Girl' - has died. She was 39.

Title: Trump confirms Zelenskyy visit to sign Ukraine minerals deal
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Volodymyr Zelenskyy would visit Washington on Friday to sign an agreement on rare earth minerals, while the Ukrainian leader said the success of the deal would hinge on those talks and continued U.S. aid.

Title: Colombian police catch man smuggling packets of cocaine under tou...
Description: Colombian police apprehended a 40-year-old man attempting to smuggle several bags of cocaine concealed beneath a meticulously attached toupee.

Title: Musk stars at Trump's 1st cabinet meeting
Description: Elon Musk starred at Donald Trump's first cabinet meeting Wednesday, with the U.S. president insisting his team was 'thrilled' with the extraordinary power given to his billionaire advisor despite reported tensions over his sweeping government cuts.

Title: What we know about US-Ukraine minerals deal
Description: Kyiv and Washington have agreed a deal to give the United States access to Ukrainian mineral resources, following a spat between U.S. President Donald Trump and Ukrainian leader Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

Title: Japan's births fell to record low in 2024
Description: The number of babies born in Japan fell to a record low of 720,988 in 2024 for a ninth consecutive year of decline, the health ministry said on Thursday, underscoring the rapid aging and dwindling of the population.

Title: Actor Gene Hackman and wife found dead alongside dog at home
Description: Gene Hackman, the intense character actor who won two Oscars in a more than 60-year career, has died alongside his wife, pianist Betsy Arakawa, and their dog at home, the sheriff's office in Santa Fe, New Mexico, said on Thursday.

Title: Recovery, resignation, death: Pope Francis scenarios
Description: Pope Francis has been in hospital with double pneumonia for 14 days — the longest hospitalization in his papacy. The Vatican says his condition is slightly improving, but doctors say his prognosis 'remains reserved.'

Title: Andrew Tate, who faces rape and trafficking charges in Romania, h...
Description: Influencer brothers Andrew and Tristan Tate, who are charged with human trafficking in Romania, have left for the U.S. after a travel ban on them was lifted, an official said Thursday.

Description: A fire gutted a three-story residential building early Thursday in less than an hour in the Philippines' capital region, killing eight people, officials said.

Description: U.S. and Russian officials met in Istanbul on Thursday for talks on resolving embassy issues as the two countries aimed to restore ties, Russian news agencies reported.

Description: Meta Platforms said on Thursday it had resolved an error that flooded the personal Reels feeds of Instagram users with violent and graphic videos worldwide.

Title: Russia's Lavrov aligns positions with Iran on nuclear program
Description: Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov and Iran's top leaders aligned positions on issues around Iran's nuclear program at talks in Tehran on Tuesday, Russia's Foreign Ministry said.

Title: N. Korea's Kim stresses 'actual experiences in modern warfare' du...
Description: North Korean leader Kim Jong-un has visited a military academy in Pyongyang, emphasizing the need to educate soldiers on 'the actual experiences of modern warfare' and master rapidly advanced weapons, state media reported Wednesday.

Title: Trump gov't will end EB-5 investor visa, replace with 'Gold Card'...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump's administration will abolish the EB-5 immigrant investor visa program and replace it with the 'Gold Card' for those who will be able to pay $5 million to the U.S. government, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said Tuesday.

Title: Deputy Pentagon chief nominee calls for efforts to stem growth of...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump's pick for deputy defense secretary highlighted the need Tuesday to stem the growth of North Korea's nuclear and missile arsenals, saying the recalcitrant regime poses a 'clear' threat to security on the Korean Peninsula and around the world.

Title: Trump orders investigation into possible tariffs on copper
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump signed an order Tuesday to look into the imposition of possible new tariffs on copper imports as he seeks to rebuild America's industry for the metal used to produce aircraft, vehicles, ships and other military hardware.

Title: Pope Francis met at the hospital with Vatican No. 2 over candidat...
Description: Pope Francis, hospitalized in critical condition with double pneumonia, was well enough to meet with the Vatican secretary of state and his deputy to approve new decrees for saints and call a formal meeting to set the dates for their canonization, the Vatican said Tuesday.

Title: German family-run machine maker issues SOS to future government
Description: Facing a slowing German economy, high energy bills, onerous bureaucracy and the threat of US tariffs, a Black Forest-based factory equipment maker is issuing a plea for help to the country's next government.

Title: Trump's US government shake-up hits agency enforcing export contr...
Description: The indiscriminate shake-up of the U.S. government under President Donald Trump has made headlines for affecting everything from nuclear weapons safety to programmes that fight diseases worldwide.

Title: Russia's Putin outlines potential aluminum, rare earth deals with...
Description: Russian President Vladimir Putin offered the U.S. the opportunity for joint exploration of the country's rare earth metals deposits, as well as the supply of aluminum to the U.S. domestic market, under a future economic deal.

Title: Ukraine rupture grows as US sides with Russia at UN
Description: The United States sided with Russia twice Monday at the United Nations, as they sought to avoid any condemnation of Moscow's invasion of its neighbor three years ago.

Title: Trump, Macron display stark differences on Ukraine despite friend...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump and French President Emmanuel Macron displayed stark differences on Monday in their approach to Ukraine, exposing a divide between the United States and Europe over Trump's bid for a quick ceasefire deal with Russia.

Title: N. Korean party delegation visits Moscow: KCNA
Description: A high-ranking delegation from North Korea's Workers' Party has arrived in Moscow for a visit at the invitation of Russia's ruling party, state media reported Tuesday.

Title: Trump says Canada, Mexico tariffs moving 'forward' on schedule
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Monday that tariffs he unveiled on Canada and Mexico are moving forward as planned, addressing reporters after meeting with French counterpart Emmanuel Macron, who urged for 'fair competition' in trade.

Title: UK announces sweeping package of sanctions against Russia
Description: Britain on Monday announced what it said was its largest package of sanctions against Russia since the early days of the war in Ukraine, including companies worldwide that supply components used by the Russian military.

Title: Vatican: Pope Francis' 'night went well,' is resting; condition s...
Description: Pope Francis slept comfortably without additional complications but remained in critical condition with kidney and respiratory issues, the Vatican said Monday morning.

Title: Pedophile French surgeon goes on trial for abusing nearly 300
Description: A former French surgeon went on trial Monday charged with raping or sexually assaulting almost 300 patients, most of them children and some of them unconscious at the time, in one of the country's largest child sex abuse cases.

Title: China's Xi affirms 'no limits' partnership with Putin in call on ...
Description: China's President Xi Jinping affirmed his 'no limits' partnership in a phone call with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Monday, China's state media reported, on the third anniversary of Russia's full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

Title: EU suspends sanctions on key Syria economic sectors
Description: The European Union on Monday eased sanctions on Syria's energy, transport and banking sectors in a bid to help the country's reconstruction after the fall of Bashar al-Assad.

Title: Tracing rise and fall of Hong Kong's Democratic Party, now facing...
Description: After the imposition of a wide-ranging national security law in Hong Kong in 2020, the Democratic Party effectively became the only sizeable opposition party left on the scene and its announcement last week of an impending closure has reignited debate on the city's politics.

Title: China's Alibaba to invest $50 bil. in AI, cloud computing
Description: Chinese tech giant Alibaba said Monday it will spend more than $50 billion on artificial intelligence and cloud computing over the next three years, a week after co-founder Jack Ma was seen meeting President Xi Jinping.

Title: Masses of mourners attend the funeral of Hezbollah leader Nasrall...
Description: Hundreds of thousands of people packed into a stadium in Beirut and nearby streets on Sunday for the funeral of Hezbollah's former leader, Hassan Nasrallah , nearly five months after he was killed in an Israeli airstrike.

Title: Federal workers confront mass confusion as Musk's deadline to lis...
Description: Confusion and chaos loom as hundreds of thousands of federal employees begin their workweek on Monday facing a deadline from President Donald Trumpâ€™s cost-cutting chief, Elon Musk, to explain their recent accomplishments or risk losing their jobs.

Title: Far-right AfD wins eastern Germany by huge margin as divisions re...
Description: The far-right Alternative for Germany (AfD) was the clear winner of Sunday's parliamentary election in the states that make up the former East Germany, highlighting lasting divisions almost a quarter of a century since the country was reunified.

Title: ByteDance restructures AI division, hiring new expert from Google...
Description: TikTok owner ByteDance is restructuring its artificial intelligence (AI) department after having poached an expert from Google to lead foundation research, according to employees of the Chinese tech giant.

Title: Netanyahu says Israel won't allow Syrian forces 'south of Damascu...
Description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu says Israel will not allow Syriaâ€™s new army or the insurgent group that led the ouster of former President Bashar Assad to 'enter the area south of Damascus' as his government made clear Israeli forces would stay in parts of southern Syria for an indefinite period.

Title: Australia fines Telegram over response to terror, abuse content
Description: Australia's online watchdog said Monday it has fined Telegram more than $600,000 for missing a deadline to reveal how it tackles 'terrorist' and child sexual abuse content.

Title: N. Korea warns of 'resolute' action against multilateral sanction...
Description: North Korea threatened Monday to take 'resolute' action after a South Korea-led monitoring group implementing U.N. sanctions against the North over its nuclear and missile programs has launched official activities.

Title: French nuclear-powered carrier makes first visit to Philippines
Description: Rising tensions in the South China Sea have made freedom of navigation exercises 'even more important,' France's ambassador to the Philippines said Sunday, as the nuclear-powered Charles De Gaulle made its first port visit to the country.

Title: Santorini seismic activity down but schools stay shuttered: Greec...
Description: Seismic activity on the Aegean Sea hotspot of Santorini has been 'decreasing' over recent days but schools will remain closed for another week, according to authorities on the Greek island.

Title: France makes arrests after deadly 'Islamist' terrorist act'
Description: French police have made several arrests since a man went on a stabbing rampage, killing one and wounding several others in what President Emmanuel Macron called an 'Islamist terrorist act,' anti-terror prosecutors told AFP Sunday.

Title: Discontented Germany votes in an election with economy, migration...
Description: German voters are choosing a new government in an election Sunday dominated by worries about the years-long stagnation of Europe's biggest economy , pressure to curb migration and growing uncertainty over the future of Ukraine and Europe's alliance with the United States. The center-right opposition is favored to win, while polls point to the strongest result for a far-right party since World War II.

Title: Trump says 'not forcing' Gaza resettlement plan
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump has appeared to soften his plan to take control of war-torn Gaza and relocate its more than two million residents to nearby countries, saying he was only recommending the idea.

Title: China is right to celebrate DeepSeek success but AI race isn't ov...
Description: DeepSeek's AI leap is a milestone innovation breakthrough for China but it does not change the overall leading position of the United States in the field of artificial intelligence, a prominent adviser to Beijing said.

Title: Trump-Putin summit preparations are underway, Russia says
Description: Preparations are underway for a face-to-face meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin, Russia's deputy foreign minister said Saturday. It marked a clear departure from Western efforts to isolate Moscow over its war in Ukraine.

Title: Pope Francis in critical condition after health deteriorates, Vat...
Description: The Vatican said on Saturday that Pope Francis' health had deteriorated over the past 24 hours and for the first time described his condition as 'critical,' reporting he had needed supplemental oxygen and blood transfusions.

Title: Trump says Zelenskyy and Putin must 'get together'
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday that Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelensky and Russia's Vladimir Putin will have to 'get together' to end the war between Moscow and Kyiv.

Title: Trump orders tighter restrictions on Chinese investments in key s...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump signed a memo Friday calling for curbs on Chinese investments in strategic sectors like tech and critical infrastructure - including restrictions by a foreign investment review panel.

Title: N. Korea designated 'high-risk jurisdiction' for money laundering...
Description: North Korea has been designated a 'high-risk jurisdiction' for money laundering and terrorism financing for the 15th consecutive year, according to a Paris-based intergovernmental body.

Title: OpenAI says it banned accounts potentially linked to N. Korea ove...
Description: OpenAI, a U.S. artificial intelligence (AI) firm, said Friday it has banned user accounts that were potentially used to facilitate a deceptive employment scheme possibly connected to North Korea, as it seeks to ensure its AI models are not utilized for malicious purposes.

Title: N. Korea seen using ChatGPT in AI education
Description: North Korea is apparently using ChatGPT, a generative artificial intelligence (AI) service developed by OpenAI of the United States, in its higher education AI studies, according to a media report Saturday.

Title: N. Korea threatens to use 'strategic means' in response to S. Kor...
Description: North Korea warned Saturday it will mobilize 'strategic means' against what it called strategic threats from the United States and other adversaries, in response to a joint military exercise between South Korea and the U.S. involving a U.S. strategic bomber.

Title: Kremlin defends Trump's 'emotional' attacks on Zelensky
Description: Kremlin defends Trump's 'emotional' attacks on Zelensky

Title: Ex-spy agency chief's NK 'nuclear state' remark causes stir
Description: Rep. Park Jie-won of the main opposition Democratic Party of Korea (DPK) on Thursday caused a stir after he suggested that South Korea should recognize North Korea as a 'nuclear state.'

Title: Chinese team finds new bat coronavirus that could infect humans v...
Description: A Chinese team has found a new bat coronavirus that carries the risk of animal-to-human transmission because it uses the same human receptor as the virus that causes COVID-19.

Title: Just 17% of Japan citizens hold passport, data shows
Description: Only around one in six Japanese citizens hold valid passports, fresh data has shown, with the number of residents travelling abroad slowly recovering but still below pre-pandemic levels.

Title: US defense chief says Musk's DOGE will have 'broad access' at Pen...
Description: Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) will have 'broad access' to root out previous administration programs at the Pentagon, U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth said Thursday.

Title: Trump, Putin meeting depends on progress toward ending Ukraine wa...
Description: A possible meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin 'will largely depend on whether we can make any progress on ending the war in Ukraine,' U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio said on Thursday.

Title: Swiss ambassador to N. Korea takes up post: KCNA
Description: Switzerland's top envoy to North Korea has begun his duties after submitting his credentials to Choe Ryong-hae, chairman of the North's parliamentary standing committee, according to the North's state media Friday.

Title: N. Korean defense chief reaffirms friendship with Russia during b...
Description: North Korea's defense minister has reaffirmed 'invincible' friendship with Russia during a banquet celebrating Russia's Defender of the Fatherland Day, hosted by the Russian Embassy in Pyongyang, state media reported Friday.

Title: S. Korea-led NK sanctions monitoring group commits to full implem...
Description: South Korea and 10 other countries highlighted their commitment to ensuring the full implementation of U.N. sanctions against North Korea over its nuclear and missile programs, a joint statement showed Friday.

Title: Trump says US government should 'take over' Washington
Description: Donald Trump said the federal government should 'take over Washington D.C.,' as the U.S. president complained about crime, graffiti and 'too many tents on the lawns.'

Title: China begins repatriation from Thailand of more than 1,000 online...
Description: An airlift carrying more than 1,000 Chinese nationals who had worked at online scam centers in eastern Myanmar began Thursday, after the rescued workers were taken across the border to Thailand and put on chartered flights to China.

Title: North Korea expert shares untold stories of Kim Jong-un in new bo...
Description: Cheong Seong-chang, director of the Center for Korean Peninsula Strategy at the Sejong Institute, is a longtime observer of North Korea and has closely followed the reclusive regime's two previous successions: before and after Kim Il-sung's sudden death in 1994 and Kim Jong-il's sudden death in 2011.

Title: Japan trade minister plans US visit in March to seek tariff exemp...
Description: Japan's Trade Minister Yoji Muto plans to visit the U.S. in March and will seek exemptions from Trump administration plans to set import tariffs on steel and cars, the Asahi newspaper reported on Thursday.

Title: China, Korea go head to head at IDEX in self-propelled howitzer m...
Description: Competition between China and Korea is heating up for sales of self-propelled howitzers, with defense contractors from both countries putting their latest versions front and center at one of the world's biggest weapons shows.

Title: Trump and Zelenskyy trade barbs as US-Ukraine relations sour over...
Description: Relations between Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy and U.S. President Donald Trump deteriorated rapidly Wednesday as Zelenskyy said Trump was living in a Russian-made 'disinformation space' and Trump called Zelenskyy 'a dictator without elections' in comments that were sure to complicate efforts to end the war.

Title: Trump to meet pharma leaders as they seek drug policy changes
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump will meet on Thursday with chief executives from major drugmakers, a White House official confirmed to Reuters on Wednesday, as the industry tries to win government support for drug pricing and insurance changes.

Title: Egypt unveils 1st ancient royal tomb since Tutankhamun
Description: Egypt's antiquities authority says it has found the ancient tomb of King Thutmose II, the first royal burial to be located since the famed discovery of Tutankhamun's tomb in 1922.

Title: US can respond in 'overwhelming' way in case of NK ICBM attack: o...
Description: A senior U.S. military official warned Wednesday that America can respond in an 'overwhelming' way in the 'time, place and manner of our choosing' in the event of a North Korean intercontinental ballistic missile (ICBM) attack as he underscored the strength of the United States' nuclear deterrence system.

Title: Trump says he will announce a range of tariffs over 'next month o...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he will announce tariffs related to lumber, cars, semiconductors, chips and pharmaceuticals 'over the next month or sooner.' (Reuters)

Title: N. Korea slams US for using AUKUS to bolster 'nuclear alliance' i...
Description: North Korea on Thursday denounced the United States for bolstering another 'nuclear alliance' in the Asia-Pacific region over Australia's move to introduce nuclear-powered submarines from Washington via the AUKUS security partnership.

Title: Japanese Embassy hosts event to celebrate emperor's birthday in S...
Description: The Japanese Embassy in Seoul hosted an event Wednesday to celebrate Emperor Naruhito's birthday in the South Korean capital.

Title: Italy arrests drug traffickers who used migrants as couriers, pol...
Description: Twenty-seven people have been arrested in a pan-European raid against two drug trafficking groups, one of which used migrants as couriers, Italy's Carabinieri police said on Wednesday.

Title: US displaced China as Germany's biggest single trading partner la...
Description: The United States was Germany's biggest single trading partner last year for the first time since 2015, displacing China from the top spot as exports to the Asian power declined, official figures showed Wednesday.

Title: Sweden's top court rejects Greta Thunberg lawsuit on climate acti...
Description: Sweden's Supreme Court ruled on Wednesday that Greta Thunberg and hundreds of other activists cannot proceed with a class action lawsuit that had sought to force the state to take stronger action against climate change.

Title: Vatican authorities say the pope now has pneumonia in both lungs....
Description: Vatican officials said late Tuesday that Pope Francis had developed pneumonia in both lungs, further complicating the pontiffâ€™s recovery. The 88-year-old pope was hospitalized Friday after a weeklong bout of bronchitis worsened. On Monday , doctors said he had developed a mix of infections in his respiratory tract.

Title: Senior NK diplomat hopes for strong exchanges, cooperation with C...
Description: A senior North Korean diplomat has voiced hopes for strong exchanges and cooperation with China this year during his meeting with Beijing's top envoy to Pyongyang, according to the Chinese Embassy in the North on Wednesday.

Title: Ex-top officials of Moon Jae-in gov't found guilty of deporting N...
Description: Four ministerial-level officials of the previous administration were found guilty, Wednesday, of repatriating two North Korean fishermen in 2019 despite their pleas to stay in South Korea.

Title: Musk's X in talks to raise money at $44 billion valuation, Bloomb...
Description: Elon Musk's social media company X is in talks to raise money from investors at a $44 billion valuation, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.

Title: Trump signals support for Russia's demand that Ukraine hold presi...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday signaled support for Russia's call for elections to be held in Ukraine, as negotiations to end the three-year-old war kicked off in Saudi Arabia between Washington and the Kremlin with Kyiv noticeably absent.

Title: US, Russia forge ahead on peace talks, without Ukraine
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump's administration said on Tuesday it had agreed to hold more talks with Russia on ending the war in Ukraine after an initial meeting that excluded Kyiv, a departure from Washington's previous approach that rallied U.S. allies to isolate Russian President Vladimir Putin.

Title: 1 of 2 N. Korean soldiers captured by Ukraine voices intent to go...
Description: One of the two North Korean soldiers captured by Ukraine has expressed his wish to go to South Korea, a news report said Wednesday, in what would be the first known case for a North Korean captive to voice an intent to defect to the South.

Title: Hamas, Israel agree return of six hostages, bodies held in Gaza
Description: Hamas and Israel announced a deal Tuesday for the release of six living hostages from Gaza and the return of four captives' bodies - including, the militants said, the remains of two young boys seen as national symbols back home.

Title: Russia, US to name negotiators on ending Ukraine war
Description: Russia and the United States on Tuesday agreed to establish teams to negotiate a path to ending the war in Ukraine after talks that drew a strong rebuke from Kyiv over its exclusion.

Title: Panama says many migrants deported from US agree to be returned t...
Description: Panama's security minister said on Tuesday that more than half of the migrants deported from the United States to transit point Panama in recent days had accepted voluntary repatriations to their home countries, largely in Asia or the Middle East.

Title: Federal judge won't immediately block Elon Musk or DOGE from fede...
Description: A federal judge refused Tuesday to immediately block billionaire Elon Musk and the Department of Government Efficiency from accessing government data systems or participating in worker layoffs.

Title: Brazil's ex-President Bolsonaro charged in alleged coup plot
Description: Brazil's former President Jair Bolsonaro was charged on Tuesday over a plot to overturn his 2022 election loss, the office of the country's top prosecutor said on Tuesday, in the latest legal setback for the far-right leader.

Title: Trump says to introduce 25% tariffs on autos, pharmaceuticals, ch...
Description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he intends to impose auto tariffs 'in the neighborhood of 25 percent' and similar duties on semiconductors and pharmaceutical imports, the latest in a series of measures threatening to upend international trade.

Title: After Trump tariffs, EU must urgently revamp economy: Draghi
Description: Radically changing the European economy is more urgent than ever after US threats of a trade war with the EU, the author of a seminal report, Mario Draghi, warned Tuesday.

Title: How US tech giants supplied Israel with AI models, raising questi...
Description: U.S. tech giants have quietly empowered Israel to track and kill many more alleged militants more quickly in Gaza and Lebanon through a sharp spike in artificial intelligence and computing services. But the number of civilians killed has also soared, along with fears that these tools are contributing to the deaths of innocent people.

Title: Villagers in southern Lebanon prepare to return home as Israeli a...
Description: Israeli forces withdrew Tuesday from border villages in southern Lebanon under a deadline spelled out in a U.S.-brokered ceasefire agreement that ended the latest Israel-Hezbollah war, but stayed put in five strategic overlook locations inside Lebanon.

Title: Top Russian, US officials meet for talks on Ukraine war without K...
Description: Top Russian and American officials met in Saudi Arabia on Tuesday to begin talks on improving ties and negotiating an end to the war in Ukraine .

Title: Chinese travel agency to bring 10 tourists to N. Korea's Rason ne...
Description: A Chinese travel agency was accepting registrations for a tour of North Korea's northeastern city of Rason next week, in yet another sign of reopening to foreign tourists after a five-year COVID-19 border closure, the firm's website showed Tuesday.

Title: China snow village apologizes for fake cotton snow
Description: A tourist village in China's southwestern province of Sichuan famed for its scenic snow landscape said it was sorry for using cotton wool and soapy water to create fake snow after online criticism from visitors went viral.

Title: Argentina federal judge to probe Milei crypto scandal, stock inde...
Description: An Argentine judge was assigned on Monday to investigate President Javier Milei's role in promoting a cryptocurrency that crashed, the latest shockwave from a scandal that has threatened to slow the libertarian leader's momentum.

Title: UN nuclear chief to view soil removed from Fukushima
Description: The UN nuclear watchdog chief arrives in Japan on Tuesday for a trip that will include his first visit to storage facilities for soil contaminated in the 2011 Fukushima disaster.

Title: FDA staff reviewing Musk's Neuralink were included in DOGE employ...
Description: U.S. Food and Drug Administration employees reviewing Elon Muskâ€™s brain implant company Neuralink were fired over the weekend as part of a broader purge of the federal workforce, according to two sources with knowledge of the matter.

Title: Baidu adopts DeepSeek AI models, chasing Tencent in race to embra...
Description: Chinese technology giant Baidu is embracing DeepSeek's artificial intelligence (AI) models by integrating it with its search engine, fast on the heels of Tencent Holdings, which recently adopted the start-up's tech into Weixin, the country's largest social media platform.

Title: Shein executive seeks to reassure investors after Trump crackdown...
Description: Fast-fashion retailer Shein's executive chairman Donald Tang told investors in a letter on Monday that 'growth remains strong' despite the United States ending duty-free treatment of low-value ecommerce packages from China and hiking tariffs.

Title: Europe talks up more defense spending as Ukraine peacekeeper plan...
Description: European leaders meeting in Paris for emergency talks on Monday called for higher spending to ramp up the continent's defense capabilities but remained split on the idea of deploying peacekeepers to Ukraine to back up any peace deal.

Title: Israeli military begins Lebanon withdrawal as deadline approaches
Description: A Lebanese official said Israeli troops had started withdrawing Monday from some border villages, after Israel's military said it would remain in five 'strategic points' hours before a ceasefire deadline to pull out.

Title: Delta Airlines plane flips on landing in Toronto, badly hurt chil...
Description: A Delta Airlines plane flipped upon arrival at Torontoâ€™s Pearson Airport and ended up on its roof Monday, injuring 19 people including three who are in critical condition.

Title: N. Korea to keep bolstering nuclear force, criticizes US for purs...
Description: North Korea said it will adhere to bolstering its nuclear force, criticizing the United States for pursuing what it called an 'outdated and absurd' denuclearization plan of the North, according to the North's state media Tuesday.

Title: 10 dead in building collapse in Egypt
Description: A three-story residential building in Egypt collapsed Monday morning, killing 10 people and injuring three others, officials said.
